text: New York Theatre may stand for: *New York Theatre Workshop, off-Broadway theatre in the Bowery, Lower East Side of Manhattan *Bowery Theatre, Lower East Side of Manhattan, New York City *Olympia Theatre (New York City), built by Oscar Hammerstein I *New Theatre Comique, former theater in New York City ==See also== * Culture of New York City#Theatre *New York Theatre Ballet
title: New York Theatre
